reviewText: One of the best Christmas traditions we have to watch as a family. My kids can watch it over and over all year long and love it.

My grandson loves this and we as a family do to because it's Christmas all the time in our house.  My grandson likes the different
covers they come in. The ones he received this time where the red covers would like to know if you have the one in this picture
if you do would like to order them. Would like to have somebody get back to me after reading this review.
